overview.en: UPC token public chain is an open source token blockchain platform with smart contract function, aiming to create a transparent, fair and free circulation era of universal pass. Global users can quantify all individual behaviors and assets into token rewards, so that global users can freely circulate in the world of blockchain. UPC, as a public chain of general certificates, provides a platform for individuals to issue individual general certificates. Through the UPC token public chain, everyone can issue his own token and exchange it with UPC token. With their own digital assets, users can broadcast to their friends in the UPC token public chain ecosystem, and complete transactions through UPC token public chain or mainstream digital exchanges. On the UPC token chain, each transaction is auditable, transparent and secure, and will be recorded as transaction history in the distributed ledger of UPC token public chain. In this process, users' privacy is always protected. Moreover, due to the decentralized characteristics of blockchain, it can realize the effective, safe, comprehensive and accurate flow of data, making the related token transactions more transparent and secure.
overview.zh: UPC通证公链是一个开源的有智能合约功能的通证区块链平台，旨在于打造透明、公平、自由流通的全民通证时代。全球用户可将个人的所有行为，资产量化成通证奖励，让全球用户在区块链的世界里自由流通。UPC作为通证公链，为个人发行个人通证提供平台。通过UPC通证公链，人人都可以发行自己的通证，并与UPC通证进行交换。拥有自己的数字资产后，用户可以发在UPC通证公链生态圈向好友广播，并通过UPC通证公链或主流数字交易所完成交易。在UPC通证公链上，用户每一次通证交易都是可审计的、透明的和安全的，并将作为事务历史记录在UPC通证公链的分布式账本上。在这个过程中，用户的隐私是随时受到保护的。而且由于区块链所具有的去中心化特性，能够实现数据有效、安全、全面、精准的流通，使相关通证交易变得更加透明与安全。
